page.title: 20Traffic in the Village.
page.content: Traffic was monitored at the roundabout at the junction of Shawfield Road, Wharf Road, Ash Hill Road and Ash Vale Road. The Volume of traffic at this junction has increased considerably over the past few years and is causing local residents much concern as the children from Shawfields First School and Heathcote Middle School have to cross here to get to school. There are no pedestrian crossings and no crossing patrol. A survey of traffic was carried out by Shawfield's children on the l9th July 1985 from 8.30 to 9.15am. They found that the volume of traffic in Vale Road was 1600 vehicles per hour and on a road this size 1800-2000 is rated capacity. During the survey 304 (approx 400 per hour) people (mainly children) tried to cross the road.
